element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm calculates the median center, showing it as the intersection between two lines, one of them vertical and the other one horizontal.
Each line divides the set of input points in two groups, each of them having the same number of points. That is, half of the points are located below the horizontal line and half of them above it.

element.name: FIELD
element.text: The field to be used for weighing points

element.name: METHOD
element.text: The following methods are available: * Median center. All points have the same weight * Weighted median centre. Weight are assigned using the selected field

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The median center, given as the intersection of a vertical and horizontal line.
